Class TKoopa

java.lang.Object
  Thing
      TEnemy
          TKoopa

public class TKoopa
extends TEnemy

This represents a Koopa in game. It can be jumped on top of to turn it into a shell. The shell can be made to move quickly left or right if a Hero jumps on it again.

Author:
Reed Weichler
